June.title: Academy Sports + Outdoors B.A.S.S. Nation Eastern Regional
June.city: Upper Chesapeake Bay, North East, MD
June.notes: Upper Chesapeake Bay and any creeks and canals connecting to the Upper Chesapeake Bay . Maryland Waters only. Only that water open to ALL public fishing will be considered tournament waters. Any waters closed to public fishing will be close to this tournament’s contestants.
